attributes.action: Social Care and NHS bonus payment should be extended to include England
attributes.additional_details:
The staff in the Social Care and NHS England have contributed just as much, with pure hard work and total dedication throughout this Covid Pandemic, and family life on hold
Westminster pays for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, yet only Scotland and Wales are rewarding NHS staff.
England has the highest population, so MORE care is needed.
So show an appreciation to Social Care and NHS staff for the whole of the UK, ie everyone gets a bonus, not just a select few.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to explain to us, why the Scottish and Welsh Governments have given a bonus to their Social Care and NHS staff, yet here in England, we have been left out.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495
